overview:
Eric Labod is the Community Manager of 6Wunderkinder. He is responsible for customer service on all channels (Such as Assistly, Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr) and checks the quality of all applications. He ensures that the user experience is always optimal. Eric always takes note of usersâ€™ wants and relays this feedback to the rest of the team to solidify the connection between 6Wunderkinder and its community. Since joining, Eric has given 6Wunderkinder the reputation of having lightening fast and high quality support.

Prior to joining 6Wunderkinder, Eric worked as a Management Assistant for digital and print media. He specialized in marketing, which gave him a good understanding of demographic and user base management.
